resources.string: The Ebiras like all other nationalities in the world have their own heroes and heroines. The Ebira speaking people are scattered in four locations in Nigeria.

The Ebiras like all other nationalities in the worldhave their own heroesand heroines. The Ebira speaking people are scattered in four locations in Nigeria. There are five clan groups in Ebiraland. These are represented by Adavi, Eganyi, Eika, Ihima and Okengwe/Okene districts. Each of the clan groups has its own several clans.

The focus of this paper is on the Ebira-Tao. The other Ebiras are Ebira Koto, Ebira Etunoh in the present Edo State and Ebira Toto in the Toto Local Government Area of the present Nasarawa State.This paper talks of some of the Heroes and Heroines of the Ebira nation because names on such lists are inexhaustible.
There are five clan groups in Ebiraland. These are represented by Adavi, Eganyi, Eika, Ihima and Okengwe/Okene districts. Each of the clan groups has its own several clans.
